CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 17, 1956, pg. 18, reads: "For Civil Defense - The Peoples Cab Company has offered its fleet to civil defense authorities in event of disaster. Left to right: Fletcher Hughey Jr., driver and member of the safety committee; Charles Levine, member of the safety committee; Adolph Fram, president of Peoples Cab; John B. Sullivan, civil defence director, and Isadore Gettleman, union president. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Fletcher Hughey Jr., Charles Levine, Adolph Fram, John B. Sullivan, and Isadore Gettleman standing in front of Peoples Cab car with sign reading "This is a unit of your civil defense"
